intro.text: Wind billows from the tracheal caverns to the East. Rot rides it, and the stench of blood fills your nostrils. The assault on your senses pulls you out of slumber. Your neurons flood with epinephrine. Panic. You are not supposed to be here. This place is for the heretics, the doomsayers, the criminals and degenerates. You must escape. Escape, before all is drowned in welcome silence. Escape, before your life is locked and failing within a...

gstart.text:
Your name is Kargunt. You awaken from a deep, drugged slumber within a horribly humid, oozing cavern. The walls are the texture of tanning leather, the ground squelches beneath your feet.
Bioluminescence brightens the chamber, flooding from tranluscent webbing in the ceiling.

GetWeap.text:
Instinct compels you to search for a weapon.
Lodged within the wall of the cavern lies a shard of osseous matter.
You grip the bone and wrench it free, blood oozing from the hole you've left in its place.

GiveUp.text:
If someone went through all the effort to drug and drag you down here,
then surely you must have done something to deserve it.
You close your eyes and quietly accept your fate.
Warmth surrounds you, your flesh becoming one with the chasm.
You have been consumed.

Advance.text:
You survey the fleshy chamber. There are three passageways.
A narrow crawlspace ahead of you, a wide but dark opening to your left, 
and an illuminated, windy corridor to the right.
Which passage sings to you?

EndGame.text:
With the Corpse Basilisk slain, the Corpse Chasm has deemed you more trouble than you are worth.
Its flesh parts before you, revealing a path to glorious daylight.

EndGame2.text:
You exit the Corpse Chasm, emerging onto the back of the ginormous creature.
Its torso stretches for miles, snakelike and many-legged.
As you gaze off in the direction of its head, you find the world's worst fear realized.

It has found Heaven.

The Corpse Chasm's head reaches into the clouds, where it has begun to feast.
The blood of Angels oozes from the Holy Realm, dripping from the beast's cavernous maw.

shop.text: The Carrion Merchant spreads its wares in front of you. There is a selection of yellow-tinged vials, sinew-woven ropes, armor carved of hardened flesh, a rusty sword, a bloodied Corpse Crusher, and a pristine Zweihander.

shopNoMusic.text: The Carrion Merchant spreads its wares in front of you. There is a selection of yellow-tinged vials, sinew-woven ropes, armor carved of hardened flesh, a rusty sword, a bloodied Corpse Crusher, and a pristine Zweihander.

buyPotion.text: You pick up a gleaming yellow vial of amniotic fluid.

buyRope.text: You select the sturdiest looking rope, all woven from different parts of the Chasm's innards.

buyArmor.text: The forged flesh reeks of death. It is, however, tougher than leather. It should do an adequate job of protecting your own flesh.

buySword.text: The sword is rusted and unbalanced, but its dullness has taken it to a point of brutal serration.

buyMace.text:
The greatmace has obviously been used. Recently.
Bits of flesh are stuck to its spikes.

buyZwei.text: You heave the Mighty Zweihander from its pedestal. It's almost too heavy for you.

vitality.text:
The Doomsayer slices a gash down their forearm. Oily blood begins to ooze freely from the wound.
They invite you to imbibe.

wealth.text: The Doomsayer tosses you one of their necklaces of teeth. These are all made of silver.

power.text: The Doomsayer whispers a forbidden incantation. The chamber quivers, and you absorb 5 points from the Chasm itself.

trap.text: As bile begins to flow into the chamber, you attempt to leap to safety.

fountain.text:
The fountain flows freely with the fluid of life, inviting you to imbibe. The sillouhettes of faces lurk in the pool's reflection.
You imbibe greedily from the fountain.

postCombatAdvance.text: The Chasm's innards split ahead. Which direction do you proceed?

GameOver.text: You have been slain. Your corpse will now become one with the Chasm.

rooms.name: Cavern
rooms.description: a damp and dark cavern of flesh, echoing with the sounds of dripping fluid.

rooms.name: Corridor
rooms.description: a dry and brown corridor lined with yellowish polyps.

rooms.name: Triangular
rooms.description: an unsettling, perfectly triangular room. The flesh here has calcified and crystallized.

rooms.name: Gore Pit
rooms.description: a pit filled with congealed blood and twisted remains, where the air is thick with the stench of decay.

rooms.name: Skeletal Antechamber
rooms.description: an antechamber adorned with shattered bones and desiccated remnants, its walls pulsating with a sickly glow.

rooms.name: Chamber of Whispers
rooms.description: a chamber where the walls seem to breathe, whispering secrets in a chorus of unsettling, infantile murmurs.

rooms.name: Fleshy Vault
rooms.description: a vault that pulsates in rhythm, its walls draped in soft, quivering tissue, giving the sensation of being watched.

rooms.name: Vein Passage
rooms.description: a narrow passageway that resembles a vein, pulsing rhythmically, with a slick glistening surface underfoot.

rooms.name: Bone Hall
rooms.description: a grand hall with jagged, bone-like structures forming grotesque arches. The walls are slick with dark, oozing fluids.

rooms.name: Spore Chamber
rooms.description: a cavernous space filled with thick spores hanging in the air, coating everything in a layer of fungal growth.

rooms.name: Digestive Chasm
rooms.description: a deep chasm filled with bubbling acid pools, where chunks of decaying flesh slowly dissolve in the corrosive mire.

rooms.name: Sinew Tunnel
rooms.description: a tight, sinew-laden tunnel, its fibrous walls pulsating in a nauseating rhythm as if the place were alive.

rooms.name: Organ Rotunda
rooms.description: a circular chamber where massive, throbbing organs hang from the ceiling, dripping bile into pools of thick fluid below.

rooms.name: Tendon Bridge
rooms.description: a narrow bridge made of taut tendons, stretching precariously across a pit filled with rotting meat and bones.

rooms.name: Womb Chamber
rooms.description: a disturbing, womb-like chamber, its fleshy walls twitching in response to movement, and a faint heartbeat reverberating through the air.

rooms.name: Cyst Cavern
rooms.description: a cavern pocked with large, swollen cysts hanging from the ceiling, their translucent membranes pulsing with a sickly glow.

rooms.name: Cartilage Maze
rooms.description: a maze of calcified cartilage, where each turn is marked by the snap and crack of brittle bones underfoot.

rooms.name: Blistered Passage
rooms.description: a passage lined with engorged blisters, some bursting with a foul-smelling ichor as you pass.

events.name: Nothing
events.description: The room is empty and quiet, naught for the dripping of mysterious fluids.

events.name: Stomach Chamber
events.description: It's too late when you discover that this room serves as some sort of stomach for the Chasm.

events.name: Doomsayer
events.description:
A figure adorned in teeth emerges from a sphincter in the wall.
"I know how the world will end. The Chasm is the key." the Doomsayer proclaims.
Will you attempt to solve their riddle?

events.name: Monster
events.description: A Chasm-dweller draws near. Its grotesque form nearly makes you vomit.

events.name: Monster2
events.description: A creature emerges from the shadows. Its stench overwhelms your senses.

events.name: Monster3
events.description: A creature emerges from the shadows. Its stench overwhelms your senses.

events.name: Amniotic Fountain
events.description: In the center of the room a yellow-tinged fountain gushes with amniotic fluid.

fixedEvents.name: Merchant
fixedEvents.description:
You notice and follow the telltale scent of a Carrion Merchant.
Draped in ragged furs and poorly tanned leather, they sift through decaying remains,
pulling out bone and innards with a practiced hand.

"Care to trade?" they rasp, their voice like grinding bones. "Fresh from the dead."

weakEnemies.name: Blood-Drenched Skeleton
weakEnemies.description: The shambling form of a once-person. Its skeletal frame is shiny with bright red viscera.

weakEnemies.name: Chasm Cultist
weakEnemies.description:
The cultist is draped in clothing stitched of flesh.
They whisper madly in a wet-sounding forbidden tongue, cursing your existence.

weakEnemies.name: Flesh Goblin
weakEnemies.description: Meat brought to life. The Flesh Goblin hungers.

weakEnemies.name: Amorphous Shame
weakEnemies.description:
The creature's grey form warps and shifts before your perception.
Yet no matter what form it takes, it retains rows and rows of razor sharp teeth.

toughEnemies.name: Crowmeat
toughEnemies.description:
Its tall and gaunt figure is wet with pink flesh and a malnourished humanoid frame.
Its head is a poor facsimile of a raven, and iron blades extend from its wrists to its elbows.

toughEnemies.name: Macrobacterium
toughEnemies.description: A slime of ginormous bacterium. The massive, acidic single-celled organism craves violence.

toughEnemies.name: Veinstalker
toughEnemies.description: Who knows how long it has been following you? The hound-like creature made entirely of tendrils pounces towards you.

toughEnemies.name: Flesh Troll
toughEnemies.description: A Flesh Goblin whose hunger has been sated. It has grown beyond its bounds, and now kills for pleasure rather than survival.

bossEnemies.name: Corpse Basilisk
bossEnemies.description: The Chasm itself yearns for your end. You face all who have been consumed.

riddles.text:
"When the sky is swallowed by flesh and bone,
What remains of light once known?
When the Chasm breathes and stars decay,
Where will the living find their way?"

"The mouth of the world opens wide,
Through it, the Heavens slide.
What teeth gnash the souls of men,
And when it's done, will it start again?"

"The marrow of life is stripped to the core,
The Chasm craves but always more.
What remains when all is fed,
And who will count the countless dead?"

"A pit with no bottom, no walls to see,
A place where flesh and spirit flee.
Who dares to look into its maw,
And who will break the final law?"

"The end begins with a single breath,
From the Chasm's maw comes endless death.
What stirs within the hollow tomb,
And who will face their final doom?"

Potion.name: Potion
Potion.description: A small vial of healing liquid. Restores health by 5 points.

Rope.name: Rope
Rope.description: A piece of rope used to aid in traps.

Beinrýtingur.name: Beinrýtingur
Beinrýtingur.description: A sharp dagger of bone ripped from the chasm.

Crowblade.name: Crowblade
Crowblade.description: The long talon that extends up the forearm of Crowmeat.
